console.log(global.keys())

let purge=[
"tzModule",
"xpathModule",
"domModule",
"uuidv1",
"uuidv4",
"uuidv5",
"CONFIG",
"get",
"set",
"close_gear_q",
"close_gear_sound",
"open_gear_q",
"open_gear_sound",
"base_q",
"base_sound",
"lum_on_q",
"lum_on_sound",
"lum_off_q",
"lum_off_sound",
"online_q",
"online_sound","starmap_on_q",
"starmap_on_sound",
"starmap_off_q",
"starmap_off_sound",
"active_scan_on_q",
"active_scan_on_sound",
"door_close_q",
"door_close_sound",
"door_open_q","door_open_sound",
"engine_on_q","engine_on_sound",
"engine_off_q",
"engine_off_sound",
"gen_on_q",
"gen_on_sound",
"gen_off_q",
"gen_off_sound",
"quantum_on_q",
"quantum_on_sound",
"quantum_off_q",
"quantum_off_sound",
"quantum_jump_sound",
"commun_swan_q",
"commun_swan_sound",
"mining_in_q","mining_in_sound",
"mining_out_q","mining_out_sound",
"mining_switch_q",
"mining_switch_sound",
"exit_q","exit_sound",
"VTOL_close_q",
"VTOL_close_sound",
"VTOL_open_q",
"VTOL_open_sound",
"mod_minage_q",
"mod_minage_sound",
"mod_defensif_q",
"mod_defensif_sound",
"mod_navigation_q",
"mod_navigation_sound",
"mod_offensif_q",
"mod_offensif_sound",
"ready_to_fly_q",
"ready_to_fly_sound",
"quantum_jump_q",
"path_sound","spy_scan",
]

for (i=0; i<global.keys().length;i++)
{
    
    if(purge.includes(global.keys()[i]))
    {
        
    }
    else{
        console.log(global.keys()[i]+"="+global.get(global.keys()[i]))
    }
}

msg.filename=msg.payload

name: conv tableau
change name
nettoyage
func:
let line=msg.payload
let delete_0='<one-of>'
let delete_1='</one-of>'
let delete_2='rule id">'
let delete_3='<grammar version="1.0" xml:'
let delete_4='</grammar>'
let delete_5='<tag>out.action.'
let delete_6='</rule>'
let delete_7='<tag>out.action=new Object(); </tag>'
let delete_8="<item></item>"
let delete_9='<rule id=';
let delete_10=global.get('swan_name');

if(line.includes(delete_10) || line.includes(delete_9) ||line.includes(delete_8) ||line.includes(delete_7) || line.includes(delete_0) || line.includes(delete_1) || line.includes(delete_2) || line.includes(delete_3) || line.includes(delete_4) || line.includes(delete_5) || line.includes(delete_6))
{
}
else
{
    
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('<!--', '\n\n<!--')
    line=line.replace('<item>', '')
    line=line.replace('</item>', '')
    msg.payload="\t\t-"+line
    return msg 
}
